      • getAllContactOnline

        public static java.util.Collection<commun.ContactDto> getAllContactOnline(int usersId)
        this method allwos to return a collection who contain each contact connected at the system who is friend with the contact id in parameter
        Parameters:
        usersId - is an integer who is the id of the contact to return his friends
        Returns:
        a collection who contain the contact connected who is friend for the user in parameter

      • getContactsById

        public static java.util.Collection<commun.ContactDto> getContactsById(int usersId,
                                                                      int userFriendId)
        this method allows to return a collection of a friend and friend's id if they are the two friend between them
        Parameters:
        usersId - is the contact to verify if he the friend of his friend
        userFriendId - is the friend to verify if the contact his friend
        Returns:
        a collection who contain zero line if they are not friend , one line if user have to friend the userFriend and not reciprocal and two line if the friendship is reciprocal

      • getAllContactPending

        public static java.util.Collection<UsersDto> getAllContactPending(int usersId)
        this method allows to return a collection of the contact in pendding of the resquest of the contact
        Parameters:
        usersId - is the contact id who want to become friend with other contact
        Returns:
        a collection who contain the contact of who the contact in parameter wait the response of the friend request
